name: Booty Buccaneer
description:
Captain of a mighty pirate ship, you find yourself in the middle of a crazy muteny. What is your crew thinking? That you'd give up your booty faster than a flapping seagul can steal your sandwhich on deck? Show them who's boss and keep them away from the treasure by shooting them.

Beware though... Bullets are expensive ! You can always earn more by playing a casual game of memory matching. Heck, with your swashbuckling skills, you got time to spare anyway !

KrassJam 8/8 ;) Enjoy !
